Title: Establishes confirmatory adoptions and allowing courts to grant the custody and support from more than two parents
Summary: Establishes confirmatory adoptions allowing adoption and parentage judgements for a child with more than two parents; recognizes functional parents as legal parents; allows "de facto parents" to get a court order confirming their parentage; grants all legal parents standing to seek visitation or custody of their children.
LawCode: Amd §§109 & 70, add Art 7 Title 5 §§119 - 119-c, Dom Rel L; add Art 5-D Part 1 §582-101, Part 2 §§582-102 - 582-104, Part 3 §§582-105 - 582-106, amd §413, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to establishing confirmatory adoptions and allowing courts to grant the custody and support from more than two parents
